Class CoinTossSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • CoinTossSimulator

  • public class CoinTossSimulator
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoinTossSimulator()
      Creates a coin toss simulator with no trials done yet (constructor).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeadTails()
      Get number of trials that came up one head and one tail since last reset.
      int getNumTrials()
      Get number of trials performed since last reset.
      int getTwoHeads()
      Get number of trials that came up two heads since last reset.
      int getTwoTails()
      Get number of trials that came up two tails since last reset.
      void reset()
      Resets the simulation, so that subsequent runs start from 0 trials done.
      void run(int numTrials)
      Runs the simulation for numTrials more trials.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoinTossSimulator

        public CoinTossSimulator()
        Creates a coin toss simulator with no trials done yet (constructor).

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run(int numTrials)
        Runs the simulation for numTrials more trials. Multiple calls to this without a reset() between them add these trials to the simulation already completed.
        Parameters:
        numTrials - number of trials to for simulation; must be >= 0

      • getNumTrials

        public int getNumTrials()
        Get number of trials performed since last reset.
        Returns:
        total amount of trials since last reset.

      • getTwoHeads

        public int getTwoHeads()
        Get number of trials that came up two heads since last reset.
        Returns:
        two heads trials since last reset.

      • getTwoTails

        public int getTwoTails()
        Get number of trials that came up two tails since last reset.
        Returns:
        two tails trials since last reset.

      • getHeadTails

        public int getHeadTails()
        Get number of trials that came up one head and one tail since last reset.
        Returns:
        head tail trials since last reset.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the simulation, so that subsequent runs start from 0 trials done.
